word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重双方静止地面对面，或指指充满勇气、信心和决心正视人或事。
通常指遇到困难或挫折，也指偶然或意外地相遇。
普通用词，本义指双方或多方从不同方向或相反方向作向对运动，最终相碰(遇)。
多指通过书信、电话或直接会面和别人联系。口语用词。
不可避免的，面对面的相遇。也指敢于正视困难或问题的决心和信心。
口语用词，含义广，侧重有勇气、决心或自信心去面对。
书面用词，多指勇敢、冷静地面临某种问题、困难或任务等。

word_group.brief_definition: 面临着；遭遇...；使（被告）和（原告）对质
面对技术的复杂度；面对科技的复杂性；直面科技的复杂性
面对复杂性；直面复杂性

bilingual.source: He decided to confront his fears head-on.
bilingual.target: 他决定正面面对他的恐惧。

bilingual.source: He was brave enough to confront the bully.
bilingual.target: 他足够勇敢去面对那个恶霸。

bilingual.source: The police confront the suspect with the evidence.
bilingual.target: 警察用证据面对嫌疑人。

bilingual.source: She had to confront the reality of her situation.
bilingual.target: 她不得不面对她的处境现实。

bilingual.source: She didn't have sufficient courage to confront him.
bilingual.target: 她没有足够的勇气去面对他。

bilingual.source: She mustered all her courage to confront the challenge.
bilingual.target: 她鼓起了所有的勇气来面对挑战。

bilingual.source: It is important to confront problems directly rather than avoid them.
bilingual.target: 直接面对问题而不是逃避它们是很重要的。

bilingual.source: Facing difficulties, he decided to cross the Rubicon and confront the challenges.
bilingual.target: 面对困境，他决定破釜沉舟，迎难而上。

bilingual.source: Everyone in town knew he was a scoundrel, but no one dared confront him.
bilingual.target: 镇上的每个人都知道他是个恶棍，但没人敢面对他。

list.abstract: 《Confront》是Nodes Of Ranvier于2007年发行的歌曲。

yingyinNormal.en: Stepping out into the universe, we must confront the reality of interstellar travel.
yingyinNormal.zh: 离开地球，走进宇宙，我们就必须面对星际穿越的真实情况。

yingyinNormal.en: So far I described how I learned to confront my own realities, my problems, my mistakes, and weaknesses. And how I surrounded myself with others who could do things better than I could.
yingyinNormal.zh: 至此我描述了如何面对自己的现实，问题错误和弱点，如何找到比我能力更强的身边的其他人。

yingyinNormal.en: You've recently moved in with Dr. Fowler, yes? I have. Clearly, your old room represents an escape hatch, and without it, you're forced to confront the terrifying reality of being trapped in a relationship with Amy forever.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你最近和福勒博士同居了，对吧？没错。显然你的旧房间代表了一个逃生出口，倘若失去了这出口，你就将被迫面对和艾米永远生活在一起的可怕现实。

yingyinNormal.en: How? Force the Chinese to confront the issue now, this round of talks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎样做? 下次谈判时，逼迫中方回应网络安全问题。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I won't tolerate deception in my relationship. I have no choice but to confront her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我无法容忍感情里出现欺骗，我无别选择，唯有跟她对质。

yingyinNormal.en: So, what's Howard doing tonight? Oh, they all went with Leonard to confront his childhood bully.
yingyinNormal.zh: 霍华德今晚在干嘛？他们都一起去见那个小时候欺负莱纳德的恶霸了。

yingyinNormal.en: That was true this week, as we mobilized the world to confront some of our most urgent challenges.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在本周里就是这样，我们动员世界各国来应对我们一些最迫切的挑战。

yingyinNormal.en: America is engaging more partners and allies to confront the growing threat of climate change before it's too late.
yingyinNormal.zh: 美国正在与更多的伙伴和盟友一起，在为时未晚之时应对不断增长的气候变化威胁。

yingyinNormal.en: I believe the Sichuan palace has been passing off orange chicken as tangerine chicken and I intend to confront them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认为四川菜馆故意用香橙鸡丁来假冒陈皮鸡丁，所以我要去对峙。

yingyinNormal.en: But first, I will raise a Sixth Amendment issue. I'm unable to confront my accuser, a non-human entity, to wit, a camera.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但首先，我要提出第六条修正案[美国权利法案]，我无法与控方对峙，因为控方是一台非人类机器，也就是摄像机。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 面对; 正视; 处理

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 对峙；敌对；对抗；冲突

word_family.mean: v. 面对；面临；对抗；正视；使面对；临到…头上；使面临；使遭遇；处理

sense_info_list.en: (of a problem, difficulty, or others) present itself to someone so that dealing with it cannot be avoided

examination_example.sentence: The ability to maintain emotional control when <highlight>confronted</highlight> by stress is one of the most important of all life's skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 面对压力时保持情绪控制的能力是所有生活技能中最重要的一项。

sense_info_list.en: face up to and deal with a problem or difficult situation
sense_info_list.zh: 面对; 正视; 处理

sense_info_list.en: compel someone to face or consider something, especially by way of accusation

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 对峙；敌对；对抗；冲突

word_family.mean: v. 面对；面临；对抗；正视；使面对；临到…头上；使面临；使遭遇；处理

sense_info_list.en: face up to and deal with a problem or difficult situation

examination_example.sentence: When <highlight>confronted</highlight> with an uncomfortable set of facts, the tendency is often to double down on their current position.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当面对一系列令人不安的事实时，人们往往倾向于加倍关注他们目前的立场。

examination_example.sentence: This means, when <highlight>confronted</highlight> by an entitled team member, an ethical leader is significantly disinclined to accommodate their demands.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这意味着，当面对一个有资格的团队成员时，一个有道德的领导者明显不愿意满足他们的要求。

examination_example.sentence: Just as the environmental harm must come under far greater scrutiny, the social cost of tourism must also be <highlight>confronted</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如环境损害必须受到更严格的审查一样，也必须直面旅游的社会成本。

sense_info_list.en: compel someone to face or consider something, especially by way of accusation
(of a problem, difficulty, or others) present itself to someone so that dealing with it cannot be avoided

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 书面用词, 多指勇敢、冷静地面临某种问题、困难或任务等。
口语用词, 含义广, 侧重有勇气、决心或自信心去面对。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 对峙；敌对；对抗；冲突

word_family.mean: v. 面对；面临；对抗；正视；使面对；临到…头上；使面临；使遭遇；处理

sense_info_list.en: face up to and deal with a problem or difficult situation

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Confronted</highlight> with this evidence, several bottled-water manufacturers including Nestle and Coca-Cola undertook their own studies using the same methodology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 面对这一证据，包括雀巢和可口可乐在内的几家瓶装水制造商采用同样的方法进行了自己的研究。

examination_example.sentence: Leah gained confidence by laying out her fears and <highlight>confronting</highlight> them directly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 利亚通过说出她的恐惧并直接面对它们而获得了自信。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Confronted</highlight> by a setback such as a disappointing test grade, students with a growth mind-set said they would study harder .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 面对挫折，比如令人失望的考试成绩，有成长型思维模式的学生说他们会更加努力学习。

sense_info_list.en: (of a problem; difficulty; or others) present itself to someone so that dealing with it cannot be avoided

examination_example.sentence: As my colleague Vann Newkirk reported, Puerto Rico is still <highlight>confronting</highlight> economic and structural destruction and resource scarcity from 2017's Hurricane Maria.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如我的同事 Vann Newkirk 报道的那样，波多黎各仍然面临着 2017 年飓风玛丽亚造成的经济和结构破坏以及资源缺乏。

sense_info_list.en: compel someone to face or consider something; especially by way of accusation

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 书面用词，多指勇敢、冷静地面临某种问题、困难或任务等。
口语用词，含义广，侧重有勇气、决心或自信心去面对。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 使面对; 使…无法回避; 对抗

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。
